A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: the ray/kylo/luke storyline saves this movie from the flaws of the redherring finn storyline. some may give bad reviews due to the vast differences in this movie from that of the original trilogy\, but overall it is a good and enjoyable work. anyone who says the prequels are better than this is kidding themselves. the acting in this film is light years better than even episode III.
